#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long

int a[12];
ll int fac[12];

void fact() {
    fac[0]=1;
    fac[1]=1;

    for(int i=2;i<=11;i++) {
        fac[i] = fac[i-1]*i;
    }
    //cout<<fac[11]<<endl;
}

int main()
{
    fact();
    int k,t,i;

    scanf("%d", &t);
    int n=11;

    while(t--) {
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
            scanf("%d", &a[i]);
        }

        scanf("%d", &k);

        sort(a,a+n);
        int last;
int sum=0;
int sum2=0;
        if(k > 0) {
            last = a[11-k];

            int start =11-k;
            for(i=0;i<11;i++) {
                if(a[i] == last) {
                    sum++;
                }
            }


            for(i=start;i<11;i++) {
                if(a[i] == last) {
                    sum2++;
                }
            }
        }

        cout<<((fac[sum] / fac[sum2]) / fac[sum-sum2])<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
